wn_print.c

00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: wn_print.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:49:43 pm HvA V1.00 $
00003 ***************************************************************************/
00004 
00005 #include <stdarg.h>
00006 #include <string.h>
00007 #include "video\v_video.h"
00008 #include "window.h"
00009 
00010 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00011    FUNCTION: wn_printf()
00012     PURPOSE: printf function for windows
00013      SYNTAX: int wn_printf(WINDOW *w, char *format, ...);
00014 DESCRIPTION: -
00015     RETURNS: NO_WINDOW: window not opened
00016              TRUE     : all ok
00017     HISTORY: 910708 V0.1 - Initial version
00018 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00019 int wn_printf(WINDOWPTR w, char *format, ...)
00020 {
00021   va_list arguments;
00022   int i;
00023   int row,col;
00024   int len;
00025   char s[132];
00026 
00027   /*------------------------
00028     Check if window opened
00029   --------------------------*/
00030   if (!w)
00031     return(NO_WINDOW);
00032 
00033   /*----------------------------
00034     Make this the active window
00035   ------------------------------*/
00036   if (w != top_window)
00037     wn_top(w);
00038 
00039   /*-------------
00040     Build string
00041   ---------------*/
00042   va_start(arguments,format);
00043   vsprintf(s,format,arguments);
00044   va_end(arguments);
00045 
00046   /*------------------------------------------
00047     Print string in window with own routines
00048   -------------------------------------------*/
00049   i = 0;                      /* Reset counter */
00050   col = w->ccx;               /* Get window cursor coordinates   */
00051   row = w->ccy;
00052 
00053   len = strlen(s);
00054   wn_log("(%02d,%02d)/%-d wn_printf(%p,%s,'%s')\n",row,col,len,w,w->title,s);
00055   if (s[len-1] != '\n') wn_log("\n");
00056 
00057   while (s[i])
00058   {
00059     switch (s[i])
00060     {
00061       case 0x0A:     /* LF */
00062         col = w->x1;
00063         row++;
00064         break;
00065 
00066       case 0x0D:     /* CR */
00067         col = w->x1;
00068         break;
00069 
00070       case 0x09:     /* HT */
00071         col += 4;
00072         break;
00073 
00074       case 0x0B:     /* VT */
00075         row++;
00076         break;
00077 
00078       case 0x0C:     /* FF */
00079         row++;
00080         col = w->x1;
00081         break;
00082 
00083       case 0x08:     /* BS */
00084         if (col <= w->x1)
00085           col = w->x1;
00086         else
00087           col--;
00088         v_setcurpos(row,col);
00089         v_printc(row,col,' ');
00090         break;
00091 
00092       default:
00093         v_printc(row,col,s[i]);
00094         col++;
00095     }
00096 
00097     /*----------------------------------------------
00098       Test position of cursor row and column, and
00099       adjust these if neccessary
00100     -----------------------------------------------*/
00101     if (col > w->x2) {
00102       col = w->x1;
00103       row++;
00104     }
00105     if (row > w->y2) {
00106       wn_scroll(w,1);
00107       col = w->x1;
00108       row = w->y2;
00109     }
00110 
00111     i++;        /* point to next character */
00112 
00113   }
00114 
00115 
00116   /*------------------------------------------------
00117     Update cursor position in window control block
00118     and on screen
00119   -------------------------------------------------*/
00120   w->ccx = col;
00121   w->ccy = row;
00122   v_setcurpos(row,col);
00123 
00124   return(TRUE);
00125 }
